outputs.output_descr:
The project aims at leading the Office of the President, as the highest symbol of the Palestinian Authority and its sovereignty, towards development of systems and procedures for decentralized governance by reflecting the best practices and effectiveness in its operations. 
The project will have five main outputs:
1.	The capacities at the Office of the President at its already existing department and new established departments of strategic technical and administrative development units are empowered. 
2.	Procedure manuals and policies in different departments are developed and used.
3.	The capacities at the Office of the Economy Advisor and the Palestine Investment Fund, which are attached to the Office of the President, are empowered. 
4.	A new facility for the Presidents Office is constructed as well as the Presidentail Kitchen is rehabilitated is bolstered as well as the working environment is improved and functional.
5.	The CIB initiative is supported and proposal is formulated and ready for implementation
outputs.output_title: Sup. to Office of President II

project_descr: "The project aims towards development of systems and procedures for decentralized governance of the Office of President by developing the effectiveness in its operations, coupled with civil works for the Presidential Kitchen and Premises.
project_title: Support to the Presidents Office Phase II
